full_threads.body:
Hello, this is the mail server on mail3.helpscout.net.

I am sending you this message to inform you on the delivery status of a
message you previously sent. Immediately below you will find a list of
the affected recipients; also attached is a Delivery Status Notification
(DSN) report in standard format, as well as the headers of the original
message.

<wordpress@hand-e-work.com.au> delivery failed; will not continue trying

Received-From-MTA: dns;pconsumer-032d7e0bb29da36e7 (10.0.202.225)

X-PowerMTA-BounceCategory: bad-mailbox
